For the riddle i drew a sketch and came up with Thursday.

Calling sunday day 1, and all "=" as stand in for "congruent mod 7":
Today is x, the day of first "when" statement is y, day of second "when" statement is z.  
x + 2 = y - 1 (the day after tomorrow will be yesterday then)
|y - 4| = |z - 4| (y and z are equidistant from wednesday)
x - 2 = z + 1 (similar to y equation)
z + 6 = y
y = 7 = 0, z = 1
x = 4
question asks for x+1 = 5.  Thursday.
